entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon then increasing to 50 gusting to 80. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
